I have no idea if this still holds up, but this game holds a special place in my heart and I still play it from time to time. Highly recommended for anyone who wants to play Counter Strike without modern gaming bullshit getting the way of the fun shooty bang bang.

I got this game as a christmas present. Was worth the 2 euros. Nice community and was fun to play. Only thing i regret is not buying this game earlier. Have a merry christmas!
